title: HiveLLM Expert Quality Metrics
description: Standardized quality metrics schema for expert evaluation

benchmark_score.description: Overall benchmark score for the expert (0-10 scale recommended)

base_model_score.description: Score achieved by the base model for comparison (0-10 scale recommended)

win_rate_vs_base.description: Win rate versus the base model (0.0-1.0 range, where 1.0 = 100% win rate)

test_queries.description: Number of queries evaluated in the benchmark

training_steps.description: Training steps completed for the evaluated checkpoint

test_date.description: Date of the quality evaluation (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD)

_comment.description: Additional notes about the evaluation methodology or results
